00014 // .NAME vtkMrmlVolumeStateNode - MRML node to save volume options.
00015 // .SECTION Description
00016 // Volume State nodes save options of a referenced volume node. Options are
00017 // things like the LUT, opacity and if the volume is faded.
00018 
00019 #ifndef __vtkMrmlVolumeStateNode_h
00020 #define __vtkMrmlVolumeStateNode_h

00022 //#include <iostream.h>
00023 //#include <fstream.h>
00024 #include "vtkMrmlNode.h"
00025 #include "vtkSlicer.h"
00026 
00027 
00028 class VTK_SLICER_BASE_EXPORT vtkMrmlVolumeStateNode : public vtkMrmlNode
00029 {
00030 public:
00031   static vtkMrmlVolumeStateNode *New();
00032   vtkTypeMacro(vtkMrmlVolumeStateNode,vtkMrmlNode);
00033   void PrintSelf(ostream& os, vtkIndent indent);
00034   
00035   //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00036   // Utility Functions
00037   //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00038 
00039   // Description:
00040   // Write the node's attributes to a MRML file in XML format
00041   void Write(ofstream& of, int indent);
00042 
00043   // Description:
00044   // Copy the node's attributes to this object
00045   void Copy(vtkMrmlNode *node);
00046 
00047   // Description:
00048   // ID of the referenced volume
00049   vtkSetStringMacro(VolumeRefID);
00050   vtkGetStringMacro(VolumeRefID);
00051 
00052   // Description:
00053   // Color look up table
00054   vtkSetStringMacro(ColorLUT);
00055   vtkGetStringMacro(ColorLUT);
00056 
00057   // Description:
00058   // Is the volume shown in the foreground?
00059   vtkBooleanMacro(Foreground,int);
00060   vtkSetMacro(Foreground,int);
00061   vtkGetMacro(Foreground,int);
00062 
00063   // Description:
00064   // Is the volume shown in the background?
00065   vtkBooleanMacro(Background,int);
00066   vtkSetMacro(Background,int);
00067   vtkGetMacro(Background,int);
00068 
00069   // Description:
00070   // Is the volume faded?
00071   vtkBooleanMacro(Fade,int);
00072   vtkSetMacro(Fade,int);
00073   vtkGetMacro(Fade,int);
00074   
00075   // Description:
00076   // Opacity of the volume
00077   vtkSetMacro(Opacity,float);
00078   vtkGetMacro(Opacity,float);
00079  
00080 protected:
00081   vtkMrmlVolumeStateNode();
00082   ~vtkMrmlVolumeStateNode();
00083   vtkMrmlVolumeStateNode(const vtkMrmlVolumeStateNode&) {};
00084   void operator=(const vtkMrmlVolumeStateNode&) {};
00085 
00086   // Strings
00087   char *VolumeRefID;
00088   char *ColorLUT;
00089   
00090   // Booleans
00091   int Foreground;
00092   int Background;
00093   int Fade;
00094   
00095   // Numbers
00096   float Opacity;
00097
